Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 55th overall pick, by West Texas in 1970...
Injured on 5/30/1970 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 3 days...
Injured on 8/6/1970 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/15/1974, off Bill Clark (PIL)...
Injured on 5/30/1976 with a Bruised Heel, out for 4 days...
Released by West Texas on 11/3/1976...
Signed as a free agent by Halifax on 11/3/1976 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 6/14/1980 with a Hyper Extended Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Released by Halifax on 5/5/1981...
Signed as a free agent by Malibu on 6/21/1981 to a 1-year deal worth $300,000 per year...
